description: New external metal fire staircase to rear elevation of building in association with application ref no 2018/2956/P dated 28/09/2018.
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the end of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

Condition : 2 - All new external work shall be carried out in materials that resemble, as closely as possible, in colour and texture those of the existing building, unless otherwise specified in the approved application. 

Reason: To safeguard the appearance of the premises and the character of the immediate area in accordance with the requirements of policies D1 and D2 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017. 
Condition : 3 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

1340-A-GA-EL-01; 1340-A-GA-EL-02; 1340-A-GA-EL-03; 1340-A-GA-PL-20;  1340-A-GA-PL-21; 1340-A-GA-PL-22; 1340-A-GA-PL-23; 1340-A-GA-PL-24; 1340-A-GA-PL-25; 1340-A-GA-PL-26;  1340-A-GA-PL-00; 1340-A-GA-PL-01; 1340-A-GA-PL-02; 1340-A-GA-PL-03;  1340-A-GA-PL-04; 1340-A-GA-PL-05 Rev B; 1340-A-GA-PL-06; 1340-A-GA-EL-11; 1340-A-GA-EL-12; 1340-A-GA-EL-13; 1340-A-GA-PL-23; 1340-A-GA-SC-03; 1340-A-SP-01; Design + Access Statement dated 22/06/2020. 

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
Condition : 4 - Prior to the installation of the external staircase, the two self-contained flats at Unit 4.1 and Unit 4.2 as shown on 1340-A-GA-PL-25 shall be amalgamated into one self-contained flat, Unit 4.1, as shown in drawing 1340-A-GA-PL-05 Rev B. 

Reason: In order to safeguard a good standard of accommodation and prevent unacceptable loss of outlook to occupiers in accordance with the requirements of policies G1, H3, D1, D2 and A1 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017.
Condition : 5 - The extension as consented under application ref no 2018/2956/P dated 28/09/2018, shall not be occupied until the external staircase has been built in line with the details secured under this planning application and it shall be maintained thereafter. If the extension granted permission under application ref no 2018/2956/P dated 28/09/2018 is later removed, the staircase hereby approved must also be removed at the same time.

Reason: In order to provide a safe and secure development in accordance with policy D1 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017 and policy 7.13 of the London Plan 2016 and policy D12 of the Intend to publish London Plan 2019.
